div.l: But she were well norysshed ⁊and a maydeA 3948
To saue his estate of ȝymmonry
And she was proud ⁊and pert as is apye3950
A full fayre syth was hit on hem to
On halydaies before here wolde he go
Wᵗith hys typet woıı̄unde aboute his hed
And she cam aft̉er in a gyde of red
And symkyn hadde hosen of þᵉ same3955
Þ̉er durste no wyth clepe her bot bot madame
Was non̄ so hardy þat wente by þᵉ wey
Þat wᵗith here durste rage or onos pley
But he wolde be slayn of symkyn
Wᵗith panade or wᵗith knyf or wᵗith bodkyn3960
For Ielous folk ben ꝑperelous eủer mo
Algate þey wolden hure wyfes wend so
And eke for she was somdell smoterlych
She was as deygne as wat̉er in dyssh
And full of hokᵉere ⁊and of bismare3965
Her þouth a lady sholde her spare
What for her kynrede ⁊and for her norterye
Þat she had lerned in þᵉ Nōnnerye
A douhter had þei bytwene hem to
Of xx ȝere wᵗith oute any mo3970
Sauynge a chyld þat was half ȝere age
In cradul hit lay ⁊and was a ꝓproꝑper page
Þis wenche þykke ⁊and wel ygrowe was
Wᵗith camoyse nose ⁊and eyen grey as glas
Wᵗith bottokes broodbrodbrood ⁊and bresetes round ⁊and heye3975
But ryth faire was hure here I wil not lye
n of ᵉ oun for sche sche was fayre
